CustomField.description: BODEV-2173: Check field to indicate whether the key contacts are specified under the Account.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL(Type,'New Business - Expansion Portal'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Existing Business-Renewal'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Existing Business-Upsell') ), NOT(Account.IsDecisionMakerandChampionadded__c) ), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Under the Account, at least one Contact should be specified as Champion and Decision Maker each.
CustomField.label: Check - Customer Key Contacts
